EmailTemplate.name: Plan Upgrade 09/16- 1346.CUS Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Important: changes to your pricing plan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations for all your success on the BigCommerce platform. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We're excited for your success and sincerely delighted that our product is helping to support your growth. Accordingly we wanted to send a courtesy notification that with your increase in orders, you’ve exceeded the current maximum amount of sales for your plan. We’ve automatically upgraded you to a new plan that includes more sales, plus advanced features to help you increase revenue and streamline your business. To see all the details of your new plan, please visit the Billing section of your control panel.
Login now <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
Learn more <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/How-Bigcommerce-Calculates-Trailing-12-Month-Sales-Orders-to-Determine-Your-Pricing?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement]]> about our pricing plans, how we calculate sales volume and more. Thanks for using BigCommerce to power your business, The BigCommerce Team
